mapper.update:
update jwjx.weixin
appID = #{appID},
originalID = #{originalID},
memo = #{memo},
appSecret = #{appSecret},
token = #{token},
access_token = #{access_token},
jsapi_ticket = #{jsapi_ticket},
nonceStr = #{nonceStr},
url = #{url},
signature = #{signature},
userDBname = #{userDBname},
loginName = #{loginName},
loginPass = #{loginPass},
sqlDbName = #{sqlDbName},
gzhAppID = #{gzhAppID},
admin_wxopenid = #{admin_wxopenid},
appletTitle = #{appletTitle},
isAudit = #{isAudit},
timestamp = #{timestamp},
isPublish = #{isPublish},
where appID = #{appID}
mapper.select:
select * from jwjx.weixin
1=1
and concat( IFNULL(appID,'') ,IFNULL(memo,'') ,IFNULL(originalID,'') ,IFNULL(loginName,'') ,IFNULL(loginPass,'') ,IFNULL(access_token,'') ,IFNULL(appSecret,'') ,IFNULL(nonceStr,'') ,IFNULL(url,'') ,IFNULL(userDBname,'') ,IFNULL(sqlDbName,'') ,IFNULL(gzhAppID,'') ,IFNULL(admin_wxopenid,'') ,IFNULL(appletTitle,'')) like concat('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
limit #{start},#{rows}

select count(1) from jwjx.weixin
1=1
and concat( IFNULL(appID,'') ,IFNULL(memo,'') ,IFNULL(originalID,'') ,IFNULL(loginName,'') ,IFNULL(loginPass,'') ,IFNULL(access_token,'') ,IFNULL(appSecret,'') ,IFNULL(nonceStr,'') ,IFNULL(url,'') ,IFNULL(userDBname,'') ,IFNULL(sqlDbName,'') ,IFNULL(gzhAppID,'') ,IFNULL(admin_wxopenid,'') ,IFNULL(appletTitle,'')) like concat('%', #{keyWord}, '%')

1=1
and simNumber like concat('%', #{data.simNumber}, '%')
and carNumber like concat('%', #{data.carNumber}, '%')
limit #{start},#{rows}

1=1
and simNumber like concat('%', #{data.simNumber}, '%')
and carNumber like concat('%', #{data.carNumber}, '%')

1=1
and clientCode like concat('%', #{data.clientCode}, '%')
and clientName like concat('%', #{data.clientName}, '%')

update egt.remote_mode
companyName = #{companyName},
controlledMember = #{controlledMember},
remoteType = #{remoteType},
account = #{account},
password = #{password},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from egt.remote_mode
1=1
and companyName like concat('%', #{data.companyName}, '%')
and remoteType = #{data.remoteType}

select count(1) from jwjx.clientinfo
1=1
and nickname like concat('%', #{data.nickname}, '%')
and sex = #{data.sex}

select *,(select memo from jwjx.weixin where jwjx.weixin.appID = jwjx.applet.appID) as appName from jwjx.applet
1=1
and nickName like concat('%', #{data.nickName}, '%')
and userName like concat('%', #{data.userName}, '%')
and phone like concat('%', #{data.phone}, '%')
and regNO like concat('%', #{data.regNO}, '%')
and companyName like concat('%', #{data.companyName}, '%')
limit #{start},#{rows}

select count(1) from jwjx.applet
1=1
and nickName like concat('%', #{data.nickName}, '%')
and userName like concat('%', #{data.userName}, '%')
and phone like concat('%', #{data.phone}, '%')
and regNO like concat('%', #{data.regNO}, '%')
and companyName like concat('%', #{data.companyName}, '%')

select *,(select memo from jwjx.weixin where appID = wxAppID) as wxName from egt.egt_company
1=1
and companyPK like concat('%', #{data.companyPK}, '%')
and companyName like concat('%', #{data.companyName}, '%')
order by companyID asc limit #{start},#{rows}

select count(1) from egt.egt_company
1=1
and companyPK like concat('%', #{data.companyPK}, '%')
and companyName like concat('%', #{data.companyName}, '%')

update egt.egt_company
companyName = #{companyName},
companyPK = #{companypk},
adcode = #{adcode},
`type` = #{type},
validFlag = #{validflag},
administrative = #{administrative},
address = #{address},
contactName = #{contactname},
contactsTel = #{contactstel},
accredit = #{accredit},
dbName = #{dbname},
dbName_LAN = #{dbnameLan},
sqlKey = #{sqlkey},
sync = #{sync},
ip = #{ip},
port = #{port},
networkIP = #{networkip},
heartbeat = #{heartbeat},
CPU = #{cpu},
osName = #{osname},
MACAddress = #{macaddress},
`state` = #{state},
`login` = #{login},
fag = #{fag},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
accuracy = #{accuracy},
radius = #{radius},
isInterior = #{isinterior},
indate = #{indate},
wxAppID = #{wxappid},
wxOpenids = #{wxopenids},
appletAppID = #{appletappid},
appletOpenids = #{appletopenids},
messages = #{messages},
menu = #{menu},
where companyID = #{companyID}
